Portsmouth Cycle Forum

Portsmouth Cycle Forum is a group for anyone who cycles, or wants to cycle, in and around Portsmouth UK.

Adopt a Bike Day at the Community Cycling Centre

Tuesday 3 May 2011
1 min

The Community Cycling Centre is offering it’s first Adopt a Bike Day on Saturday 7 May from 12 to 2 at the Stacey Centre, Walsall Road, Copnor, PO3 6DN.

We have a selection of refurbished child, youth and adult bicycles which we will give away in exchange for a donation to cover our costs.

If you have a old bike languishing in your garden shed that you’d like to donate to our not-for-profit project then we’d be pleased to hear from you. Call us on 07407 374 497 or email community@pompeybug.org.uk.

The Community Cycle Centre is managed by Portsmouth Cycle Forum.

For more details please see the Community Cycle Centre web page at http://www.pompeybug.co.uk/community/community-cycle-centre/.
